## özet

* p-hacking
* dark chocolate case 
* 6th sense case 
* same data different conclusions case (do black players get more red cards? 29 groups work on same data; 8 groups said "equally likely", 19 groups said "more likely" 2 groups said "3 times more likely" 
* 53 landmark cancer studies only 6 of them can be reproduced

##

> nearly 1/3 of the published results will be wrong even if the things are working normally (ie. statistical power of 80%)

> typical statistical power in studies is around 20-40%
